channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1472714363836542984
item.description: Dos elogios en esta jornada: uno, al @ServelChile, que hizo el conteo rápido e inapelablemente y de forma transparente, como siempre. Y dos, a mis amigos de @DecideChile y @unholster, que aprovecharon los datos abiertos del Servel y fueron un poco antes en los cómputos.

item.title: #en @ 1472653257151504392

item.title: #es @ 1472628000680288259
item.description: #TransformaciónDigital Con la pandemia, la aceleración digital se ha convertido en gran aliado de la lucha contra la corrupción y la promoción de la integridad pública, a través de los datos abiertos y las tecnologías digitales. Descubre más aquí: https://t.co/7njzZZTkP2 https://t.co/KumJhMUhAT

item.title: #en @ 1472627090289795078
item.description: Anyone want to pursue a FOI request? Looking to see daily ICU admission data added the same way ICU occupancy is currently provided in ON daily status reports, PHO dashboard and provincial Open Data data files. ICU admits are more timely and relevant for new severity trends. https://t.co/DkzkWxdmxH

item.title: #nl @ 1472607536297783301
item.description:
Hele land wederom in lockdown. Alhoewel.
Ruim 200.000 middelbare scholieren zullen deze week toch weer de klaslokalen bevolken: - zonder afstandsregels, - zonder mondkapjes, - zonder verplichte zelftesten.
Lerend vermogen kabinet is nihil!
#Onderwijs 👇 https://t.co/maFaFY9HRG

As the team fine tunes the reward functions, we will watch the economy blossom.

item.title: #fr @ 1472535774612578304
#de @ 1472521963822325760
item.description:
Die türkische und tatarische Minderheiten in Rumänien veröffentlichten zwischen 1897 und 1940 25 Periodika. Ein ausführlicher Katalog stellt sie vor: „Die turko-tatarische Presse der Dobrudscha 1897-1940“ (Heidelberg 2004)
https://t.co/RcUHc6O4hH
#MENAdoc #openaccess https://t.co/zm7RDd6euO

item.title: #en @ 1472485612523556864
item.description: Women’s capacity to exercise and expand their agency depends on the econ resources they can use, control, and own. Across low-income settings, women have less access than men to physical and productive assets including land, housing, and financial assets: https://t.co/a26xI5RpRN https://t.co/tAJGpvJkdw

item.title: #es @ 1472470274947915776
item.description: Pasco #COVID19 al 16Dic2021 #DatosAbiertos Leve aumento de casos (de 7 a 10 por día), principalmente en la provincia de Oxapampa. En cuanto a las muertes, la situación es estable en los últimos 3 meses. En cuanto a UCI y Hospitalización por encima del 95% de camas disponibles. https://t.co/ZseT0AwkpU https://t.co/6PFjkzf9d0

item.title: #fr @ 1472280939044741134
item.description: Selon les calculs de @flodebarre, basés sur des données parcellaires (car @SantePubliqueFr ne les publie pas en #OpenData), le taux d’Omicron pourrait déjà atteindre environ 20% en Île-de-France. Si ça se confirme, ce variant pourrait y devenir majoritaire rapidement, avant Noël. https://t.co/UjAmsSsl3d

item.description:

Casser la boussole quand la tempête arrive, c'est terrible

item.title: #en @ 1471929793587286016
item.description: Today the wonderful @kannywan leaves our OpenData Portal team for an amazing opportunity at @US_FDA . Kanny evolved from a med chemist to a project manager & data curator, presenting to pharma and NIH leadership about covid variants on a regular bases. We'll miss you Kanny!!!

item.title: #fr @ 1471912783352680451
item.description: Chaque jour jusqu'au 31/12, une raison pour soutenir Open Food Facts. C'est un peu notre calendrier de l'avent laïque et citoyen. Retweeter est déjà une forme de soutien :) https://t.co/oGNp1yP6Yf #projetcitoyen #independant #OpenData #OpenFoodFactsFR https://t.co/t6UgzMTrmq

item.title: #en @ 1471910040676220934
item.description:
Combined deployed subgraphs on the network & hosted service continue to grow ~15% MoM (282% YoY), with over 31,000 lifetime subgraphs 🌐
Dapps have steadily been migrating subgraphs to the network, fueled by the ethos of decentralization, public APIs & open data accessibility. https://t.co/4aQLxWtEpI

item.title: #en @ 1471898007100694531
item.description:
I'm very disappointed this slipped through review. 😡 Nice article and progress on general solubility predictions. But no #opendata and no #openscience on the ML model. Just a website..
I hope @jcheminf will make progress to ensure future papers don't slip through the cracks. https://t.co/XMnouqwooe

item.title: #fr @ 1471840415783473152

item.title: #fr @ 1471838037999034372
item.description: Nous sommes présents avec @hatonjan pour le lancement de plan 2021-2023 pour un gouvernement ouvert. @GuillaumeRozier rappele que c'est l'#OpenData qui permet la mise en place d'un cercle vertueux de co-construction entre l'État et les citoyens et citoyennes. https://t.co/qEBlAGZz0Q

item.title: #fr @ 1471820784200994828
item.description: #COVID19 Données #DREES en #opendata. item.title: #it @ 1471791427084595202
item.description:
❓ Chi sono i firmatari del referendum sulla cannabis?
👉🏻 In base agli open data disponibili sul sito dell'@ass_coscioni le firme raccolte sono state 607.627. Il 63% dei firmatari è uomo (mentre il 37% è donna) e il 71% ha meno di 35 anni.
1/ https://t.co/EOgMrVuOMV
